Name: 混沌小队（CHAOS SQUAD）
About the game: Chaos Squad is a turn-based tactics game with Cthulhu, rouge-lite and survival elements. Build Your Squad Select from 10 unique heroes, whom are you gonna team with? Each hero has a specially designed skill kit. Choose their skills and equipment wisely to be your great powers. A Wide Range of Skill Pool Each hero has 6 active skills, 3 passive skills and 1 captain skill that can strengthen the whole squad and it's all your choice. Some can improve your damage dealing, some can save the whole squad and some allow you to wipe out your enemy but require some patience. Fight Against Epic and Twisted Enemies Be prepared to challenge 12 different bosses. At each main level, you have to face a gargantuan boss that pushes you to the limits. Will you survive from the untold monsters? 5 Distinct Environments Immerse yourself in a world of 5 distinct intriguing environments, discover hidden treasures and fight with an enormous variety of hostile creatures. Dim woods, broad desert, gloomy underground mine, a snowy mountain with cold wind and even the chaotic magic world awaits. Rest and Get Ready for Next Customize your style of play in the town which is the only shelter on this continent. Here, you can enhance your equipment and skills to new levels, recover injuries, buy supplies and prepare for the next adventure.
